ygData.subject: Re: Battle in Antarctic
ygData.msgSnippet: Also, Megaton would be rolling boulders on no-one I think. EndBringer s group was engaged in combat with the ambushers, so they were on top of the mountain.

Also, Megaton would be rolling boulders on no-one I think. 
EndBringer's group was engaged in combat with the ambushers, so they 
were on top of the mountain.

::EndBringer/Scyther/Demise::

EndBringer smiles, jumping up as missiles destroy his 'padestral'. He 
flies down and lands on top of Tankorr, his tentacles instantly 
wrapping around the bot. He laughs as he sends millions of volts of 
electricity through the bot. Even for someone Tankorr's size, the 
shock would produce critical damage.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther frowns as Paralysis crawls toward him. He backs up, his 
scythe ready to sever the Predacon's head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise roars as Rampage begins to crush his leg, feeling something 
snap. His giant claws slash down and close around the attacker, 
sinking into him.
